title: American_Top_40_1987_Top_100
description:
"You're listening to American Top 40's world-wide presentation of the 100 biggest hits of '87, I'm Casey Kasem."


American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This recording is a rebroadcast from internet radio.


In these top 100 songs of 1987, 46 acts have their first hit, 15 hits are by female solo artists, and 10 songs are from motion pictures.

There are 8 remakes, 2 of which hit number 1 the first time, and then went on to hit number one again.

Eight hits are by duos and there are 3 Canadian acts

Five songs have a person's name in their title, 3 songs have foreign titles, 2 songs were recorded live (and both by guys named Billy), and there is only one instrumental.

And Casey finally says the title of George Michael's song, "I Want Your Sex."
